references.paper_title: BiomedLM: A 2.7B parameter language model trained on biomedical text
references.reason: This paper is cited as demonstrating superior accuracy in medical diagnostics and regulatory compliance, showcasing the effectiveness of biomedical LLMs.

references.paper_title: Large language models encode clinical knowledge
references.reason: This study is highlighted for its significant contribution to understanding how LLMs can effectively integrate and utilize medical domain-specific knowledge.

references.paper_title: ChemCrow: Augmenting large-language models with chemistry tools
references.reason: This paper is mentioned for its successful application of knowledge injection techniques in the chemistry domain, demonstrating advanced capabilities in scientific text processing.

references.paper_title: GeneGPT: Augmenting large language models with domain tools for improved access to biomedical information
references.reason: This work is cited as an example of leveraging external tools and knowledge to enhance LLM performance in biomedicine, thus illustrating a key approach in knowledge injection.

references.paper_title: Crystal structure generation with autoregressive large language modeling
references.reason: This research is mentioned for its advancements in material science, demonstrating the application of knowledge injection techniques in material property prediction and discovery.
